{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.13028v1", "title": "Profinite Iterated Monodromy Groups of Unicritical Polynomials", "summary": "Let $f(x) = ax^d + b \in K[x]$ be a unicritical polynomial with degree $d
\geq 2$ which is coprime to $\mathrm{char} K$. We provide an explicit
presentation for the profinite iterated monodromy group of $f$, analyze the
structure of this group, and use this analysis to determine the constant field
extension in $K(f^{-\infty}(t))/K(t)$.", "main_category": "math.NT", "categories": "math.NT,math.DS", "published": "2025-04-17T15:39:16Z"}
